alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Northern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 9:45AM EST until December 24 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Lake effect snow, dangerous wind chills, and blowing and drifting snow expected. Additional snow totals a half inch to two inches, mainly along and north of the Indiana Toll Road. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Indiana, Elkhart, Northern La Porte, Eastern St. Joseph IN and Western St. Joseph IN Counties. In Michigan, St. Joseph MI County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Northern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
